name: Warp Cars
description:
A car-football game for Galway Game Jam #5

The theme was 'warp', so there's a warp thing spawning lots of balls. Also some warpy shader effects and electric guitar whammy-bar warpy sound when someone scores ;-)

Red Car: Arrow Keys or Controller 1

Blue Car: TFGH or Controller 2. That's right, TFGH rather than WASD. Because of a weird hardware limitation I never knew about which causes certain key combinations to interfere with each other when multiples are held at once

10 point for a goal, 1 point for an endzone
